mn8:3.4_0: “Yā imā, cunda, anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti—

mn8:4.1_1: vijjati yaṁ idhekacco bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ
mn8:4.4_0: Na kho panete, cunda, ariyassa vinaye sallekhā vuccanti.

mn8:12.2_0: ‘Pare vihiṁsakā bhavissanti, mayamettha avihiṁsakā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
mn8:12.3_0: ‘Pare pāṇātipātī bhavissanti, mayamettha pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā bhavissāmā’ti sallekho karaṇīyo.
